content: The Puppet Spider's Spirit allows you to take the form of the spider and use its long fangs to slice and dice your enemies. Sadly, this move doesn't inflict any poison damage, but it can still be very handy in battle. The equipped effect is also pretty good, slowing down the decay of Might so you can use your Transformations for longer.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Puppet_Spider_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Puppet Spider Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Puppet Spider Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
The Puppet Spider's Spirit allows you to take the form of the spider and use its long fangs to slice and dice your enemies. Sadly, this move doesn't inflict any poison damage, but it can still be very handy in battle. The equipped effect is also pretty good, slowing down the decay of Might so you can use your Transformations for longer.
